GV

Capabilities, outcomes, and the nuts & bolts behind this service.

Capability

I will be your Shopware Developer

At the end of the project, the client receives:

  • Fully functional Shopware store or plugin

  • Source code and assets

  • Setup and user documentation

  • Testing report / QA summary

  • (Optional) post-launch support or update plan

Blueprint

How it works

Process, scope, and collaboration notes.

  • Shopware Store Setup & Configuration

    Installation and environment setup (Shopware 6 or 5) Configuration of store settings (languages, currencies, taxes, shipping, and payment methods) Integration with hosting and domain Basic performance optimization and cache configuration

  • Theme Development / Customization

    Custom Shopware storefront theme or layout based on your brand guidelines Responsive, mobile-friendly design Styling adjustments using Twig, SCSS, and JavaScript Integration of custom banners, typography, and color palette QA and cross-browser testing

  • Plugin / Extension Development

    Development of custom plugins or extensions (Shopware 6 plugin system) Documentation of plugin functionality and installation steps Testing and debugging for compatibility with your Shopware version Optional: publishing setup for Shopware Store or private plugin distribution

  • Third-Party Integrations

    Integration with payment gateways (Stripe, PayPal, etc.) Shipping and logistics APIs (DHL, UPS, etc.) CRM, ERP, or marketing tools (Mailchimp, HubSpot, etc.) Data sync or automation via API

  • Product & Catalog Setup

    Bulk import or configuration of product categories, variants, and attributes SEO-friendly product descriptions, URLs, and meta tags Stock and pricing configuration Data migration from another platform (optional)

  • Testing & Quality Assurance

    Functional testing of store features (checkout, search, cart, filters) Cross-device and browser compatibility testing Bug fixing and optimization before handover

  • Documentation & Handover

    Admin and maintenance documentation (how to manage products, orders, etc.) Code and plugin documentation (if applicable) Deployment notes and credentials handover Optional: walk-through session (recorded or live)

  • Optional Add-ons (if you offer ongoing support)

    Post-launch support (e.g., 30 days bug fixing or maintenance) Continuous updates (Shopware patches or version upgrades) Performance tuning and SEO audit Custom feature requests

Let’s collaborate

Have a roadmap, a stubborn bug, or a moonshot in mind? I’m all ears.

Send a note to giang.dlinh@gmail.com with a short brief, a timeline, and any handy context. I’ll reply within 48 hours with next steps and a plan to get things moving.
